email.title: Stake Zero Ventures: Future of Blockchain
email.text:
Hi everyone,
Our sponsor, Stake Zero Ventures, have got in touch to advertise their Future of Blockchain event. If you're interested in blockchain, read below!

​ ### **£2k-£20k across 25 cash prizes... and possible startup funding.**
**Challenge:** Build anything involving blockchain or answer one of 8 challenges.
**[Apply now](https://www.futureofblockchain.co.uk/register) before Sunday 9th December 2018.**
If you want to read more about the challenges, [visit our website](https://www.futureofblockchain.co.uk/) or our [medium](https://medium.com/future-of-blockchain).
If you have any questions, email anthony@stakezero.com.
